name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Customer Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in customer success through effective communication and collaboration. Proficient in SQL, API development, and SaaS solutions, with hands-on experience in integrating CRM and ERP systems. Adept at utilizing tools like Intercom and Slack to enhance customer interaction and engagement.
Combining technical acumen with a strong foundation in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, I develop high-performance solutions that bolster customer satisfaction in the healthcare and financial sectors. My expertise in full-stack development includes working with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.
With a solid background in cloud services including **Azure** and **AWS**, I have led the creation of enterprise-grade platforms integrating advanced technologies for predictive analytics and real-time data processing. My experience encompasses designing and implementing microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, ensuring robust security and adherence to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I also possess practical knowledge in developing machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows leveraging tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
